title: Jacob Rees-Mogg – 2022 Comments on “Lightweight” Scottish Leader
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jacob Rees-Mogg, the Leader of the House of Commons, on Newsnight on 12 January 2022.
content:
Douglas Ross has always been quite a lightweight figure. I think the Scottish Secretary is a much more substantial figure in this.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
